meanings.definition: A kilt or knee-length skirt with pleats at the back, originating in Scotland.
meanings.sent1: He proudly wore his philabeg to the Scottish festival.
meanings.sent2: The traditional Scottish dancers twirled in their colorful philabegs.
meanings.sent3: The philabeg swirled as he danced a lively jig.
meanings.sent4: Her philabeg was a symbol of her Scottish heritage.
meanings.sent5: The wind caught the pleats of the philabeg, creating a mesmerizing effect.

meanings.definition: To wear or dress in a philabeg.
meanings.sent1: She decided to philabeg for the special occasion.
meanings.sent2: They philabeged in traditional attire for the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: He philabegs with pride whenever he visits Scotland.
meanings.sent4: The actors will philabeg for the historical reenactment.
meanings.sent5: Philabegging in the Scottish style made him feel connected to his roots.
